name: CCI: Crime Connect Investigation
description:
Game for Lost Relic Games Jam #1  Theme - Connection

CCI: Crime Connect Investigation - It is a private detective agency and they are looking for new workers. You have passed the psychotechnical tests but now comes the final test, the dreaded: month of test.

If you manage to solve the crimes by discovering the sequence of events and the elements involved in it during the next four weeks, you will be hired.

Connect by threads the pins with the evidence in the order of the crime panel, go through the old files to find out what happened and try not to send innocent people to jail.

I - Check the order of events.

II - Connect the proofs with thread, from pin to pin. (click and drag).

III - If there's a binder icon, check color, number and page.

IV - If you make a mistake you can remove the threads with the "Reopen case" button.

V - "Close case" with button.

Thanks for playing!

You can download the assets that I have made for the game

https://endorth.itch.io/cci-crime-connect-investigation-assets
